job.command:
umask 2 limit coredumpsize 0 limit starver dev STAR_LEVELS pwd set fzdfile=$FILEBASENAME.fzd set seed=`expr &nIndex; \* 1000` echo &codePath;
ls -al
ln -s ./GenerateVertex.C ./GenerateVertex4WBoson.C set my_command='root4star -q -b ./GenerateVertex4WBoson.C(0,&nEvents;,'$seed',"@'$FILELIST'","vertex.txt")' echo echo "Executing..." echo $my_command eval '$my_command' >&! &outPath;/log/${FILEBASENAME}_vertex.log
set my_command="starsim -w 0 -b ./simWRequest.kumac nevents=&nEvents; config=&sample; run=&runNumber; seed=$seed file=$fzdfile vertexfile=vertex.txt" echo echo "Executing..." echo $my_command eval '$my_command' >&! &outPath;/log/${FILEBASENAME}_starsim.log
set my_command='root4star -q -b ./bfcMixer_pythia.C(&nEvents;,"@'$FILELIST'","'$fzdfile'","P14igpp510","","W")' echo echo "Executing..." echo $my_command eval '$my_command' >&! &outPath;/log/${FILEBASENAME}_bfcMixer.log
ls -al
